program: Honours Bachelor of Science in Human Kinetics (BScHK)
notes: You can take up to 48 units at the 1000 level.
To find an elective, see the course timetable.
Science optional course: Choose 3 units from ANP1107, BIO2110, BIO2133, or CHM2120.
Optional APA courses (1000/2000): Choose from APA1122, APA1302, APA2134, APA2302, or LSR1100.
Optional APA courses (3000/4000): See the list of APA courses for eligible options.
If you haven’t completed Chemistry 4U or equivalent, you must enrol in CHM1301.
If you haven’t completed Physics 4U or equivalent, you must enrol in PHY1331.
To enrol in MAT1330, you must have completed MAT4U or MAT1339. Units for this course are additional.
APA4200 or APA4211 counts as 3 units per term and is offered year-round. Enrol in APA4211 by clinical deadline.
For APA4211 clinical registration, contact the Faculty of Health Sciences placement adviser.
Following the exact sequence is essential for 5-year graduation. Deviations may delay completion.
Students with advanced standing must contact the Academic Office to review their personalized course path.

Fall: ENG1100 or ENG1112 | Workshop in Essay Writing or Technical Report Writing
Winter: ANP1105 | Human Anatomy and Physiology I
BIO1140 | Introduction to Cell and Molecular Biology

Fall: APA2140 | Introduction to Sport and Exercise Psychology
MAT1330 | Calculus for the Life Sciences I
Winter: APA2114 | Biomechanical Analysis of Human Movement
APA2180 | Research Methods in Human Kinetics
APA2314 | Laboratory Techniques in Exercise Physiology and Biomechanics

Fall: APA3381 | Measurement and Data Analysis in Human Kinetics
APA42001 or APA42111 | Research Project (1) or Internship (1)
Winter: APA42002 or APA42112 | Research Project (2) or Internship (2)
